description: 0xScope x Mantle AI Fest is a free NFT collection issued by the 0xScope team. It serves as proof of participation in the Mantle AI Fest Campaign. Scopechat users who complete the minting process can claim points on the Scopechat campaign website. This NFT has no transactional value and is not meant to be traded.
name: 0xScope x Mantle AI Fest
